nodes.text: The Bosthirda separatists were a Human-based organization that tried to secede their homeworld of Bosthirda from the reconstituted Sith Empire; in truth they were only thralls of the Dark Councilor Darth Xedrix, who used them in his machinations. At last on 3954 BBY they were discovered and annihilated by the Sith Lord Scourge and the Dark Councilor Darth Nyriss's troops.
